stack.name: actionlib

description.brief: A standardized interface for interfacing with preemptable tasks.

stack.description: The actionlib stack provides a standardized interface for interfacing with preemptable tasks. Examples of this include moving the base to a target location, performing a laser scan and returning the resulting point cloud, detecting the handle of a door, etc.
stack.author: Eitan Marder-Eppstein
Vijay Pradeep
